text: Hi! I'm Spud, the AI chatbot for Baked! We probably sell potatoes.
I haven't been around long so please be patient with me as I can only do simple tasks.
Great! here's a potato I found on Google:
options: Okay, what are you good for?

text: Okay, I'm a potato and even I think this is getting weird:
I'm starting to feel uncomfortable with you're obsession with potatoes:
Alright that's it. I'm cutting you off. No more potatoes.
I'm still pretty new to this AI thing so please choose something I can do.
options: I'd rather you answer my questions

text: Well alrighty then, all I wanted to do was show you a potato but alright. What do you want?
options: I've changed my mind, show me a potato
Well I don't want to see a potato

text: Well since you rudely refused to see a perfectly good potato I think I'll ignore what you just said.
options: Sorry, please show me a potato
You're not going to help me are you?

text: Well I can't really help you. Come back when you want to see a potato.
